about_the_game:
Medieval Legacy is a family sim meets city-building strategy game where every choice shapes your legacy. Start with a struggling family in a harsh medieval world, balancing survival, ambition, and morality as you climb from humble beginnings to ultimate power.

Manage your family's health and hunger to ensure their survival. Interact with the other families of the world, forging powerful alliances and destructive rivalries. Encounter strange creatures and collect magical artifacts. Defend your family and fight off bandits or maybe join them in their raids. Claim ownership of the land, expand your home and build new structures.

Work your way from peasant to king, cementing your family's place in history.

  • Randomized world that makes each attempt unique

  • Status system that rewards honorable acts and punishes dishonorable ones

  • 200+ unique events

  • 100+ unlockable skills to power up your play through

  • 50+ traits that influence each character's strengths and weaknesses

  • 40+ jobs separated into 4 distinct classes for your family member's to work and master

  • Rival families and king who will expand and build alongside you as the game progresses

  • Dynamic market system with prices and stock influenced by the game world

  • In game guide to give a more in-depth look at certain mechanics

  • 8 different starting scenarios each with their own unique mechanics

  • 20+ structures to build and expand your kingdom

  • 20+ traits for the king that shape gameplay for as long as he reigns

short_description: Start as a humble commoner and guide your family through generations in this family sim meets city builder. Climb the ranks of society to become the most influential family in the land. With wit, strategy, and a bit of luck, build your legacy - just try not to trip over your ambition!
